mosinstall.name: Flash Rotator
mosinstall.author: JoomlaShack
mosinstall.description: This module displays a dynamic transitional slideshow from a selection of JPG images. You can name the images whatever you want as long as they are uploaded into the modules/js_flashrotator/jpg folder and all permissions are set to 777. You must utilize all 5 image fields or you will have long pauses in your movie. For best performance make sure your images are the same size as your specified movie settings. Enjoy this release from JooomlaShack with special thanks to Jeroen Wijering for all his work.

param.name: width
param.label: Width (px)
param.description: Movie width (forces all images to be displayed with this width)

param.name: height
param.label: Height (px)
param.description: Movie height (forces all images to be displayed with the height)

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: Movie background Color
param.description: The background color for your movie (shows in bgfade)

param.name: rotatetime
param.label: Tween Time
param.description: Set this number to the desired amount in seconds to tween in between images

param.name: transition
param.label: Transition Effect
param.description: Select the transition you wish to apply to the flash object. Sorry No Random Transitions!

param.name: shownavigation
param.label: Show Navigation
param.description: Select if you would like navigation to appear in your movie

param.name: transparent
param.label: WMODE=Transparent
param.description: This makes the module transparent. Background color is overridden. Use this to fade your JPG's over a graphic background styled in your CSS module class suffix
